Cole Academy - Charter School in Lansing
Cole Academy is a neighborhood Elementary school serving grades K-8 in Lansing and East Lansing, Michigan. Always tuition free and non-profit public school.

span.span: Cole Academy provides a challenging learning environment with high expectations for each child. Students receive developmentally-appropriate instruction that allows for individual differences and learning styles in a safe, orderly, caring and supportive environment. Cole Academy graduates will be equipped with the necessary skills to excel in middle school, high school and college.

p.span: Meet the educators and learn about our philosophy

div.data-state: hidePlayButton autoplayOff idle notMobile desktopView touchRollOut

span.span: Cole Academy has over a 30 year history of serving children in the greater Lansing area. Now operating as a district, Cole Academy provides small intimate settings for K-6 students in two locations in Lansing and East Lansing.

The philosophy at Cole Academy is that all children have unique traits and value. Therefore, we feel that it is the responsibility of all Cole Academy staff to ensure that differentiated instruction occurs at every level. The staff of Cole Academy work together to provide the best possible learning environment for each student. To help this endeavor, each classroom is staffed with a certified teacher and a highly qualified Para-professional teacher assistant with a 1:15 ratio of student and staff.

We believe and value community and family, which is why our building principals become familiar faces and staff goes the extra mile. Principals greet students and parents as they arrive and leave the building each day and play an active role within the classroom.

p.span: Meet the educators and learn about our philosophy

span.span: Want a tour? Have questions about enrollment? Contact us here:
Are you a dedicated educator? Want to join our team? Contact us here:
